body_html:
@benmyara thank you for the bug report. I've been able to repro it:

import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable

input_size = 4
hidden_size = 5
gru = torch.nn.GRU(input_size, hidden_size, 2)
input = Variable(torch.randn(10, 3, input_size))
h0 = Variable(torch.randn(2*1*10000, 3, hidden_size))
gru(input, h0)

#3925 will fix this.

body:
@benmyara thank you for the bug report. I've been able to repro it:
```
import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable

input_size = 4
hidden_size = 5
gru = torch.nn.GRU(input_size, hidden_size, 2)
input = Variable(torch.randn(10, 3, input_size))
h0 = Variable(torch.randn(2*1*10000, 3, hidden_size))
gru(input, h0)
```

#3925 will fix this.
